contents.newMember:
Hello {{member.firstName}}, I'm {{user.firstName}} from Laguna Health. We partnered with {{org.name}} to provide you free post-hospital recovery support. Tap below to download the app and schedule the first check-in.
{{dynamicLink}}
contents.newControlMember: Thank you for joining the Laguna study!
contents.newMemberNudge:
Hello {{member.firstName}}, I'm {{user.firstName}} from Laguna Health. Friendly reminder to download the app and schedule your first check-in:
{{dynamicLink}}
contents.newRegisteredMember: Welcome to Laguna Health. To get started on your recovery journey schedule a check-in with your Laguna coach here.
contents.newRegisteredMemberNudge: Friendly reminder from {{user.firstName}} at Laguna Health. I'm looking forward to supporting you on your recovery journey. To get started schedule your first check-in here.
contents.appointmentScheduledMember: Hello {{member.firstName}}, your appointment with {{user.firstName}}, your Laguna Health coach is scheduled for {{appointmentTime}}.
contents.appointmentLongReminder: Reminder: You have an appointment on {{appointmentTime}} with {{user.firstName}}, from Laguna Health.
contents.appointmentReminder: Hello {{member.firstName}}, this is {{user.firstName}}. Our meeting will start in {{gapMinutes}} minutes
contents.appointmentRequest: Hello {{member.firstName}}, it's {{user.firstName}}, your Laguna Health coach. Tap here to schedule our next meeting
contents.newChatMessageFromUser: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, sent you a new message.
contents.logReminder: Track your recovery progress, and share it with your coach.
contents.newChatMessageFromMember: You have one new message from your member, {{member.firstName}} {{member.lastName}}.
contents.appointmentScheduledUser: Hello {{user.firstName}}, an appointment has been added to your schedule on {{appointmentTime}}.
contents.memberNotFeelingWellMessage: Your member, {{member.firstName}} {{member.lastName}}, logged a score that requires your attention.
contents.setCallPermissions: Tap to set your call permissions
contents.scheduleAppointment: Hello {{member.firstName}}, please tap the link below to schedule the first check-in
contents.assessmentSubmitAlert: High Assessment Score [{{org.name}}]: Alerting results on {{assessmentName}} for {{user.firstName}} {{user.lastName}}’s member - {{senderInitials}}. Scored a `{{assessmentScore}}`
contents.answerQuestionnaire: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, sent you a questionnaire. Tap here to fill it

createTodo.Meds: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, added a new medication for you. Tap here to review
createTodo.Appointment: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, added a new appointment for you. Tap here to review
createTodo.Todo: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, added a new to-do for you. Tap here to review

createTodo.Explore: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, sent you a new resource to assist in your recovery. Tap here to review

updateTodo.Meds: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, changed your medications. Tap here to review
updateTodo.Appointment: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, changed an appointment details. Tap here to review
updateTodo.Todo: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, changed a to-do. Tap here to review

deleteTodo.Meds: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, deleted a medication. Tap here to review
deleteTodo.Appointment: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, deleted an appointment details. Tap here to review
deleteTodo.Todo: Your coach, {{user.firstName}}, deleted a to-do. Tap here to review

alerts.customContent: {{member.firstName}} sent you a message via text
alerts.newChatMessageFromMember: {{member.firstName}} sent you a message via chat

introduceYourself.title: Introduce yourself
introduceYourself.description: My name is Jeff, I'm recovery coach from Laguna Health. I've been working in Laguna Health for one year now, and I have 25 years of experience as a licensed psychologist.

introduceLagunaHealth.title: Introduce Laguna Health
introduceLagunaHealth.description: Laguna Health partnered with Anthem inc to support you on your recovery journey. The reason for my call today is that we have information that your recently got admitted for unstable Angina.

caregivers.title: Ask about member's caregivers
caregivers.description: Obtain their contact information and get consent to speak to them.

downloadApp.title: Guide the member how to download the mobile app and register
downloadApp.description: Discuss app features and how it will help elements of their recovery.

conversationalAssessment.title: Begin conversational assessment
conversationalAssessment.description:
Some example questions for first call:
 - "How are you doing today?"
 - "What brought you to in the hospital?".

questionnaire.title: Questionnaire
questionnaire.description: Member Persona (If depression or anxiety are suspected, administer PHQ9 and GAD7).

careInformation.title: Gather care information
careInformation.description: Are you in pain? When do you expect to be discharged? Where will you be going?

homePreparation.title: Home preparation
homePreparation.description: Do you have what you need at home for your recovery? Examples: Food, medication (someone to pick it up), modifications to home- including safety?

poc.title: Create and implement POCs
poc.description: If barriers are identified: Include "Prepare Home".

scheduleNextAppointment.title: Schedule next appointment
scheduleNextAppointment.description: Set up an appointment in no more than 2 business days.

empatheticResponse.title: Empathetic response
empatheticResponse.description: Recovery can be exhausting. Your body is working hard. It can be stressful when you are too tired or weak to take care of yourself

assess1.title: Assess
assess1.description: Is the member more tired/weak than they were- is it improving or getting worse?

assess2.title: Assess
assess2.description: Has the member discussed the fatigue/ weakness with their healthcare team?

assess3.title: Assess
assess3.description: Does your member have the needed providers: PCP, specialists?

assess4.title: Assess
assess4.description: Is the member comfortable calling their healthcare team?

assess5.title: Assess
assess5.description: What is your member’s ability to communicate symptoms to their healthcare team?

assess6.title: Assess
assess6.description: Does the member have people in their care circle to assist with making phone calls and taking the member to their appointments?

assess7.title: Assess
assess7.description: What benefits does the member have for telehealth or home health visits?

assess8.title: Assess
assess8.description: If your member is too tired or weak to travel, consider telehealth/ home health services as an option

supportiveStatement.title: Supportive Statement
supportiveStatement.description: We will figure this out together

prepareMemberToCallProvider1.title: Prepare your member to call the provider
prepareMemberToCallProvider1.description: Help your member make a list of symptoms to report to the healthcare team

prepareMemberToCallProvider2.title: Prepare your member to call the provider
prepareMemberToCallProvider2.description: Include contextual information: When weakness started, any procedures/ illnesses that member recently had, new medications the member may have been started on, patterns of sleep, excessive movement/ exercise, changes or stressors in the member’s life

prepareMemberToCallProvider3.title: Prepare your member to call the provider
prepareMemberToCallProvider3.description: If there is a caretaker involved: Include them in the preparation discussion

prepareMemberToCallProvider4.title: Prepare your member to call the provider
prepareMemberToCallProvider4.description: If the member is unable to call the healthcare team or is unable to communicate effectively, call the healthcare team with the member on the phone (conference call). This way the member can give consent for you to speak on their behalf. You are also role-modeling how to advocate and if the physician has a question for the member, they will be on the call

toDoToEncourage1.title: Use ToDo function in the Laguna App to encourage member to
toDoToEncourage1.description: Call health care team or send a message through the patient portal

toDoToEncourage2.title: Use ToDo function in the Laguna App to encourage member to
toDoToEncourage2.description: Report your symptoms to the healthcare team including: When fatigue/ weakness started, any procedures/ illnesses that you recently had, new medications, patterns of sleep, excessive movement/ exercise, changes or stressors in your life

toDoToEncourage3.title: Use ToDo function in the Laguna App to encourage member to
toDoToEncourage3.description: Ask about possible causes of weakness

toDoToEncourage4.title: Use ToDo function in the Laguna App to encourage member to

toDoToEncourage5.title: Use ToDo function in the Laguna App to encourage member to
toDoToEncourage5.description: Ask about risks and benefits of options

influence.title: Influence
influence.description: Physicians prefer that you report when your fatigue or weakness is not improving or worsening so they can evaluate if there is a cause that can be treated
